channel.title: Need some help!

item.title: Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

I’m sorry but it gives me the same error …
Do you whana my client.java file ? To see if there is from another thing that problem … ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 06:23:03 am[/size][hr]Well the right code was

public void ServerHelpMenu() { sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144); // Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@" + "xxxxxxx.no-ip.biz", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@" + "admin", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@" + " admin, Oledis, ....", 8150); sendQuest(" ", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@" + " ---", 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@" + "xxxxxxx.no-ip.biz", 8153); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushoutStream(); }
With “o” not “O” (small O)
Thanks !!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

public void ServerHelpMenu() {
    sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@" + "xxxxxxx.no-ip.biz", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@" + "admin", 8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@" + " admin, Oledis, ....", 8150);
    sendQuest(" ", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@" + " ---", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@" + "xxxxxxx.no-ip.biz", 8153);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
}

there you go.
all you had to do is change the zero in flushOutstream(); to a capital O

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

no look againd i will modify to understand [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 06:06:52 am[/size][hr]If its correct why they say me this error ?

client.java:5049: cannot find symbol symbol : method flush0utStream() location: class client flush0utStream(); ^ 1 error Fiished ! Press any key to contiunue . . .

Can you make me a correct code ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 06:10:55 am[/size][hr]Here is a picture


[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 06:11:38 am[/size][hr][quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:287991”]did you declare this:

he is correct.

flush0utStream();
^

public void ServerHelpMenu() {

    sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@" + ".no-ip.biz", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(),
            8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@" + "admin", 8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@" + " admin, Oledis, ....", 8150);
    sendQuest(" ", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@" + " ---", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@" + "www.xxxxxx.no-ip.biz", 8153);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
}        ^

notice the difference?
it’s a typo.

also your not allowed to advertise in anyways so atleast remove the serverIP.
also www.xxxxxxxxx.no-ip.biz wont work in your webbrowser. www. + dynamic dns = false[/quote]

Well there is O not 0

item.title: Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

did you declare this:

he is correct.

flush0utStream();
^

public void ServerHelpMenu() {

    sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@" + "fatalnation.no-ip.biz", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(),
            8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@" + "admin", 8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@" + " admin, Oledis, ....", 8150);
    sendQuest(" ", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@" + " ---", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@" + "www.fatalnation.no-ip.biz", 8153);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
}        ^

notice the difference?
it’s a typo.

also your not allowed to advertise in anyways so atleast remove the serverIP.
also www.xxxxxxxxx.no-ip.biz wont work in your webbrowser. www. + dynamic dns = false

item.title: Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Sorry for double posting AGAIND !!!
Yes i know but i dont get answers

Well when i compile , it give me this error :

client.java:5049: cannot find symbol symbol : method flush0utStream() location: class client flush0utStream(); ^ 1 error Fiished ! Press any key to contiunue . . .

So where i did wrong ?

Here is the code

[code] public void ServerHelpMenu() {

    sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@" + "fatalnation.no-ip.biz", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(),
            8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@" + "admin", 8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@" + " admin, Oledis, ....", 8150);
    sendQuest(" ", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@" + " ---", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@" + "www.xxxxxxxx.no-ip.biz", 8153);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
	
}

[/code]

[code]

if (command.equals("help"))
{
	ServerHelpMenu();
}[/code]

Ryan : Replace the '0' with an 'O', also, next time don't create multiple topics. Just edit the old post/reply to the thread.

I dont see any 0 … !!!
